com.kohlschutter.stringhold.StringHolderScope

    Classes in com.kohlschutter.stringhold that implement StringHolderScope
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    LimitedStringHolderScope
    A StringHolderScope that keeps track of the aggregate minimum length of all associated StringHolders and, optionally, invokes a given callback whenever the limit is exceeded.

    Modifier and Type

    Description
    static final StringHolderScope
    StringHolderScope.NONE
    Placeholder to be used to indicate "no scope" where null is not allowed.
